title: Adele - Skyfall (Official Lyric Video)
description:
Adele's official lyric video for her single ‘Skyfall'. 

As featured in the film 'Skyfall'. Click to buy/listen: http://smarturl.it/AdeleSkyfall
 
Follow Adele
Website: http://adele.com 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Adele

Lyrics 
Let the sky fall
When it crumbles
We will stand tall
Face it all together
At skyfall
At skyfall

Skyfall is where we start
A thousand miles and poles apart
Where worlds collide and days are dark
You may have my number, you can take my name
But you’ll never have my heart
